        public Ship startShip()
        This method initialize the ship.
        post: The ship is already created.

      • initializeClients

        public void initializeClients()
        This method initialize the five clients and deploy it. pre: Ship already created.
        post: The five clients are already created.

      • showClients

        public void showClients()
        This method show the five clients. pre: Clients are already created.
        pre: Kilograms transported will be visible after ship sail (option "can the ship sail?") that means after complete the travel .
        post: Show the five clients updated.

      • readLoad

        public void readLoad()
        This method reads the entry data by the client and decide if the load can create or no. pre: Clients are already created.
        pre: Array of loads already initialize.
        post: Load is created or not, depend of the data entry of user.

      • switchMenuClients

        public java.lang.String switchMenuClients(int g)
        This is an auxiliary method for the method "readLoad". pre: Clients are already created.
        pre: Select an option between 1 to 5.
        Parameters:
        g - is the option of client post: returns owner is the String of client name.

        public void showMenu()
        This method shows the Main menu. pre:
        post: shows the options.

      • toPaid

        public void toPaid()
        This method shows the value to paid for the client that the user choose. pre:A client must has a load as minimum.
        pre: Select an option between 1 to 5.
        post:Show the value to paid for the client that user elected.

        public int readOption()
        This method read the option entry by the client for the Main menu. pre:Select an option between 1 to 8.
        post:

      • occupatePosition

        public int occupatePosition()
        This method analize the position of the array list of loads. pre:A load was created as minimum.
        post:Returns the position of the loads array.

      • valuePaidDueType

        public void valuePaidDueType()
        This is method calculate the value to paid by client depend of the client type and apply the discount. pre:A load for a client was created as minimum.
        Parameters:
        x - is the result of parcial value to pay
        loadType - is the type of load post: Returns x is the operation of apply the discount.

      • operation

        public void operation(int choice)
        This method is a switch that allows entering the options of the Main menu by an user selection. pre:Clients are already created.
        post:Redirect to the entered option.
        Parameters:
        choice - is the option by the user

      • startProgram

        public void startProgram()
        This method starts the program and keeps showing the Main menu until user select option "EXIT". pre:.
